sourcesContent:
// ServiceCard.js
import React from 'react';
import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card';
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';

import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup';

function LearningService() {

  return (
    <CardGroup>

      {/* Card 1 */}

      <Card>
        <Card.Img variant="top" src= {require('./OnlineClasses.jpg')}/>
        <Card.Body>
          <Card.Title>Online Courses and Classes</Card.Title>
          <Card.Text>
            Provide a variety of online courses covering different subjects and skill levels.
            Include live and recorded classes, allowing students to learn at their own pace.
          </Card.Text>
        </Card.Body>
        <Card.Footer>
          <small className="text-muted">Last updated 3 mins ago</small>
        </Card.Footer>
      </Card>

      {/* Card 2 */}

      <Card>
        <Card.Img variant="top" src= {require('./LearningTools.jpg')} />
        <Card.Body>
          <Card.Title>Interactive Learning Tools</Card.Title>
          <Card.Text>
            Develop and integrate interactive tools such as quizzes, simulations, and virtual labs to enhance the learning experience.
            Offer gamified elements to make the learning process engaging and enjoyable.
          </Card.Text>
        </Card.Body>
        <Card.Footer>
          <small className="text-muted">Last updated 3 mins ago</small>
        </Card.Footer>
      </Card>

      {/* Card 3 */}

      <Card>
        <Card.Img variant="top" src= {require('./LearningSpaces.jpg')}/>
        <Card.Body>
          <Card.Title>Collaborative Learning Spaces</Card.Title>
          <Card.Text>
            Create virtual classrooms or study groups where students and teachers can interact in real-time.
            Facilitate discussions, group projects, and collaborative activities to foster a sense of community.
          </Card.Text>
        </Card.Body>
        <Card.Footer>
          <small className="text-muted">Last updated 3 mins ago</small>
        </Card.Footer>
      </Card>
    </CardGroup>
  );
}

export default LearningService;
